name: Fenty beauty - Pro Filt'r soft matte longwear foundation
description: The Pro Filt'r long-wearing foundation instantly gives the skin a smooth, matte finish and an ultra-natural effect. It works easily for medium to total coverage.

name: Fenty beauty - Gloss Bomb
description: Gloss Bomb is the supreme gloss that brings an irresistible shine to your lips while nourishing them.

name: Tarte - Shape Tape contour concealer
description: This total matt, ultra-blurable formula instantly helps to brighten, smooth & give the skin a firmer and lifted appearance. Full coverage with flawless matte finish.

name: Laura Mercier - Translucent Loose Setting Powder
description: Light, satiny and silky loose powder. Non-greasy, it fixes makeup to extend the hold, while giving a natural look, without mask or powder effect.

name: Urban Decay - All Nighter Long Lasting Makeup Setting Spray
description: Our All Nighter Makeup Fixing Spray spreads over makeup without the effect of material for a perfect hold for 16 hours, without leaking, turning, drying out or migrating into the folds of the face.

name: Urban Decay - Eyeshadow Primer Potion
description: Eyeshadow Primer Potion is the essential base for a long-lasting eyeshadow.

name: Urban Decay - 24/7 Glide-On Eye Pencil
description: Pigmented, shiny and a bit spangled, they adapt to all tastes: around the eyes as an eyeliner, inside the eye in kohl or over the entire eyelid like an eye shadow... Rich in vitamin E and Jojoba oil, its formula ensures an extra long lasting 24/7!

name: Benefit Cosmetics - The POREfessional Face Primer
description: Quickly reduce the visibility of pores and fine lines for smoother skin. The translucent formula of our foundation contains a derivative of vitamin E, known to combat the harmful effects of free radicals.

name: Too Faced - Natural Lust Eye Shadow Palette
description: The Natural Lust Eyeshadow Palette is made up of a selection of 30 shades: neutral tones, bewitching smoky shades and charming bright colors, available in multiple finishes for irresistible natural beauty.

name: BECCA Cosmetics - Skin Love Weightless Blur Foundation
description: A light foundation, with medium modular coverage and a velvety mat finish for a soft and radiant health effect.

name: Huda Beauty - Contour & Strobe Set
description: Gorgeous when used individually, the sets are also perfect for creating an ombr√© effect for the illusion of fuller lips. Simply line with the Lip Contour, then fill in lips with the Liquid Matte shade before applying the high-shine Lip Strobe for a plumped-up effect.

name: Huda Beauty - Life Liner
description: The ultimate lifeproof, dual-ended eyeliner with a liquid tip one side and pencil on the other. Long-lasting, waterproof, smudge proof and fade proof.

name: Marc Jacobs - Velvet Noir Major Volume Mascara
description: Experience ultimate volume and the look of thick, false lashes with Velvet Noir Major Volume Mascara. The lash-maximizing, curvy brush places the most volume at the hard-to-reach center lash line, and the defining tip styles lashes for major drama.
